mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `contact` (name, position, phone, email,sort) VALUES (#{contact.name}, #{contact.position}, #{contact.phone}, #{contact.email}, #{contact.sort})
mapper.update: UPDATE `contact` SET name = #{contact.name}, position = #{contact.position}, phone = #{contact.phone}, email = #{contact.email}, sort = #{contact.sort}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{contact.id}
